metadata.synopsis: One liner with a male Human worker outside the Baldurs Mouth building
metadata.how_to_trigger: Talk to the male human worker outside the Baldurs Mouth building at coords: 83, 41, -54

0.speaker: Delcan
0.text: Sorry, was I not clear enough last time? I DON'T SELL THE BROADSHEETS. Goodbye.

1.speaker: Delcan
1.text: I keep telling you animals. If you want to buy a gazette, talk to the loud little shits screaming headlines. I deliver the papers. I do NOT sell them.
